# OSBundleUsageDescription

**Property List Key**

A message that tells people why the app is trying to install a driver extension bundle.

## Discussion

This key is required for all [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/DriverKit] extensions. Failure to include this key results in an error at activation time. For system extensions that are not DriverKit extensions, use [doc://com.apple.bundleresources/documentation/BundleResources/Information-Property-List/NSSystemExtensionUsageDescription] instead.

## System Extensions

- **NSSystemExtensionUsageDescription**: A message that tells people why the app is trying to install a system extension bundle.
